page.title: 19Industry: Coates/Eastrea
page.content: By far the most important industry within the grid area is {FARMING. However, it employs comparatively few. The majority of farms are operated by one man and his family. Casual labour,especially women,is hired for seasonal work.Other industries in the area: { Commercial stationery} {Road haulage Garage services { Market gardening Egg producers { Plant hire Caravan storage { Potato merchant Welding { Builders Light engineering { Pottery Electrical contr. { Plumbers Tile manufacture These are the larger businesses in the area, although some are run from the 'operators' own home.There are a number of one man firms not shown.An example is the fact that 2 large road hauliers operate from Coates, together with dozens of one man owner/operators
